Author: ced
Content:
Oy, is that really the ideal we're supposed to aspire to? The American Dream?

Think about how many people in need one could help with 1 million per year...

Author: ced
Content:
This: http://searchengineland.com/061229-084131.php

says that Google maps has less than half the marketshare of MapQuest. I'd love to see an article explaining why that is. First mover advantage?

Author: jward
Content:
News.yc is written in arc, which to my best knowledge is a functional lisp like language.

Reddit is written in Python using web.py as the framework. It was originally written in lisp but they changed to Python for various reasons.

Author: gduffy
Content: That would be somewhat shortsighted of us :)
